name: Magneblade
description:
Magneblade was Created for 'Waltzing Game Jam 3'. You are equipped with a glove that can attract blades and also power modules. If you collect more than you can handle, the blades will repulse, flying to an opposite direction and cause damage in the process. The goal is to power up a portal inside the lab your stuck in so that you can escape. But beware - as this lab has had bad experiments and they will haunt you.

How to play:

WASD keys - Move

E key - Use

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look

Mouse Left Click - Fire

The Team

Wam - Code

Renderbydavid - Modeling

Junior Amaris - Character Modeling, Animation

Atenmusic - SFX

Robert_ - SFX

Darren Curtis - Music

PlasticCog - SFX
